EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Strata_2015.Promo Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Can’t wait to see you at Strata + Hadoop World!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME Tagline HEADLINE GOES HERE AND IS ALL CAPS Pivotal has a lot going on this year as a sponsor, presenter and exhibitor at Strata + Hadoop World <http://strataconf.com/big-data-conference-ca-2015> - February 17-20th in San Jose, CA. If you haven’t registered yet, use Pivotal 20 <https://en.oreilly.com/big-data-conference-ca-2015/public/register> to get a 20% discount on the current published price.
Come to the booth (#721) and meet members of our data science team who will be on hand to answer your thorniest data questions. We will also be showcasing our Pivotal Big Data Suite <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite> with demos and tales of transformation.
Pivotal Sessions:
- Rock Star Data Science in 2015: A Panel Discussion <http://strataconf.com/big-data-conference-ca-2015/public/schedule/detail/41132> The Pivotal Data Science Team Thursday, February 19 @ 11:30 AM Location: LL20 D
- Pro Bono Data Science in Action – Helping Teens in Crisis <http://strataconf.com/big-data-conference-ca-2015/public/schedule/detail/38228> Noelle Sio, Principal Data Scientist, Pivotal Thursday, February 19 @ 2:40 PM Location: LL20 A
- Purdue University Data Science Case Study Pivotal's collaboration with Purdue to improve graduation rates Srivatsan Ramanujam, Senior Data Scientist, Pivotal Thursday, February 19 @ 6:00 PM Location: Pivotal booth (#721)
- Big Data vs. Climate Change <http://strataconf.com/big-data-conference-ca-2015/public/content/solutions-showcase> John Cardente, Distinguished Engineer and Lead Data Scientist, EMC Srivatsan Ramanujam, Senior Data Scientist, Pivotal Thursday, February 19 @ 6:30 PM Location: Solutions Showcase Theater
- Agile Data in the Cloud Era: A New Approach <http://strataconf.com/big-data-conference-ca-2015/public/schedule/detail/40699> Sundeep Madra, Head of Data Products, Pivotal Friday, February 20 @ 9:25 AM Location: Grand Ballroom 220
See you in San Jose!
The Pivotal Team
